# Module: tf.contrib.keras.datasets.imdb

### Module `tf.contrib.keras.datasets.imdb`



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/keras/api/keras/datasets/imdb/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/contrib/keras/api/keras/datasets/imdb/__init__.py).

IMDB movie review sentiment classification dataset.
